name: omega-dev-chat
description: Developer chat app with AI code generation and GitHub integration

scripts.dev: npm run check-deps && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.check-deps: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const paths=['node_modules','backend/node_modules','frontend/node_modules']; const missing=paths.filter(p=>!fs.existsSync(p)); if(missing.length>0){console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è  Missing dependencies in:', missing.join(', ')); console.log('üí° Run: npm run install-all (one time only)'); process.exit(1);} else {console.log('‚úÖ All dependencies installed - starting servers...');}"
scripts.quick-start: npm run check-deps || npm run install-all && npm run dev
scripts.kill-ports: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); try{const p5000=execSync('netstat -ano | findstr :5000 | findstr LISTENING').toString(); const p5173=execSync('netstat -ano | findstr :5173 | findstr LISTENING').toString(); console.log('Ports in use:', p5000||p5173?'Yes':'No');}catch(e){console.log('No processes found');}"
